javadoc:
This class converts arbitrary int keys into compacted int indexes suitable
 for use as indexes into an array or table.  Whenever a new key is added,
 the smallest unused index is allocated and associated with that key.
 Basically hashes the keys into linked lists using the IntListIndexer class,
 where all values in a list have
 the same hashcode.  Does most of the work in implementing a seperate chaining
 version of a hashtable - the only thing missing is the values which are stored
 in the individual implementations of the various hashtables.

methods.javadoc: Constructs an IntKeyIndexer with a default capacity.
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs an IntKeyIndexer with a default capacity.

methods.javadoc:
Constructs an IntKeyIndexer with a given initial capacity.
@param capacity the initial capacity.
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs an IntKeyIndexer with a given initial capacity.

methods.name: put
methods.comment:
Returns an index that will always be associated to the given key as long as
 the key remains in the table. If the key already exists, then the index where
 that key is stored is returned.  If the key is new, then a new index is allocated,
 the key is stored at that index, and the new index is returned.

return.comment: index for key, or -1 if there was no room to put the key.

methods.name: get
methods.comment:
Returns the index for the given key, or
 -1 if key is not in the table.

params.name: key
params.comment: the key for which to find an index.

methods.name: remove
methods.comment: Removes the key from the table.

return.comment:
index of the key if the key was found, -1 if
 key did not exist in the table

methods.javadoc: Returns the number of keys stored in the table.
methods.name: getSize
methods.comment: Returns the number of keys stored in the table.

methods.javadoc: Returns the current size of the key table.
methods.name: getCapacity
methods.comment: Returns the current size of the key table.

methods.javadoc: Returns a array containing all the keys stored in this object.
methods.name: getKeys
methods.comment: Returns a array containing all the keys stored in this object.

name: IntKeyIndexer
comment:
